name: Bryce 5 Scene File
summary: Learn about .BR5 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: DAZ 3D Bryce is an application for modeling, rendering, and animating 3D landscapes. Bryce scenes may range from simple three-dimensional objects to fully textured landscapes. Bryce users can save BR5 scenes as images or render them as 3D animations.
NOTE: Metacreations initially developed Bryce, which Corel later purchased, then released version 5. DAZ Productions later bought Vryce and released version 6.

instructions: You can open BR5 files with DAZ 3D Bryce (version 5 or later) in Windows or macOS. For example, to open a BR5 file, select File â†’ Open.
DAZ 3D Bryce can convert BR5 files to various file types, including the following formats:
